test.instr: (:ins (:task (close X) (:cond (sort X washmachine))) (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (type Y container) (sort Y washmachine))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (color X red) (sort Y television))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (type X container) (sort X teapoy))) (:task (putdown X) (:cond (color X black) (sort X bottle))) (:info (plate X) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X red) )) (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X washmachine))) )
test.nl: Close the washmachine. Take out the can from the washmachine. Put the red book on the television. Go to the teapoy. Put down the black bottle. The red cup is on the plate. The door of washmachine is closed.
